title: 304. What Are the Secrets of the German Economy — and Should We Steal Them?
description: Smart government policies, good industrial relations, and high-end products have helped German manufacturing beat back the threats of globalization.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Smart government policies, good industrial relations, and high-end products have helped German manufacturing beat back the threats of globalization.
